name: Dr Phi oxygen ampoule
description: Main benefits of the ampoules :- decrease skin puffiness and uneven tone -increase energy level of the cells and increase cell turnover- help shrinking the pores and don't let skin accumulate dust and dirt -counteract the aging process, which is exacerbated by a lack of oxygen in skin cells- deeply moisturize skin, restoring its pH balance and shielding it from sun damageOxygen contains multiple ionic minerals, enzymes and amino acids, that can nourish and regenerate our skin. Skin cells which are regularly supplied with oxygen will always look more healthy and vitalized. Ampoules are for external use and should be applied on skin following the given instructions.
